content: you have 32 sole stitches left once both sole and instep have 32 stitches continuing the instep pattern as charted in chart b and the sole is all knit stitches until about 1 5 inches until your desired length or wherever you usually begin doing the toe toe round 1 k all stitches round 2 k1 ssk k to last 3 stitches before marker k2tog k1 sl marker repeat decrease on sole repeat these decreases until 10 stitches remain on each side graft the live stitches together make the second sock the same way weave in all tails proudly wear them to show that you ain t afraid of no ghosts
